Human Services Data Specification (HSDS) OpenAPI Spec - JSON

This is the API definition for the HSDS format. It is available as an HTML list, JSON and YAML OpenAPI Specifications. If you are looking for the schema for HSDS, there is a separate JSON schema available for the project.

There Are A Handful Of Ways To Engage:
  • HTML Outline (current)
  • OpenAPI Spec (JSON)
  • OpenAPI Spec (YAML)
  • Discussion
